short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Displays a deck summary for each player during a game of Dominion.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension displays a deck summary for each player during a game of Dominion. The deck summary includes a count of the total cards each player owns along with a list of the specific cards each player owns. To see the deck summaries, begin a game of Dominion, and open the Spectators tab.

This extension only works at https://dominion.games
